verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the mountain where I run
The fountain I drink from
Oh He is my song

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the shadow where I hide
the randsom for my life
Oh He is my Song

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are good
You're good oh

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the wind inside my sails
the anchor in the waves, oh He is my song.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the fire inside my veins
the echo of my days, oh He is my song.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: You're never gonna let, never gonna let me down
